responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "BFA20786440063D2E29CED982EF65301", "My journey into the ruins of Carphin were not as succesful as I had hoped. I lost a contingent of hired arms just breaching the entranceway. Although my time in the library was short in time and distance I did procure a few things of interest. A few scrolls and gems I have yet to decipher in language and power. They appear to be focused on forbidden arts of the Atrax dynasty.")
name: MIDD_0020_MOM_Book_WizardJournal_3
